mediawiki-to-eclipse-help.title: GProf User Guide
mediawiki-to-eclipse-help.pageAppendum:
= Updating This Document =
This document is maintained in a collaborative wiki. If you wish to update or modify this document please visit https://wiki.eclipse.org/Linux_Tools_Project/GProf/User_Guide .

target.name: test
target.description: verify that all of the HTML files are well-formed XML
target.echo:
Validating help content XML and HTML files: The Eclipse help system expects well-formed XML
If validation fails it is because either:
* the userguide source code is poorly formed, or * the WikiText MediaWiki parser has a bug
Problems with userguide source are usually caused by improper use of HTML markup in the MediaWiki source, or inadvertently starting a line with a space character (in MediaWiki this starts a preformatted block)
